description: Dragonfly created accounts that appeared to be tailored to each individual staging target.

description: Dragonfly deleted system, security, terminal services, remote services, and audit logs from a victim.

description: Dragonfly leveraged Outlook Web Access.

description: Dragonfly used remote access services, including VPN and Outlook Web Access (OWA).

description: Accounts created by Dragonfly masqueraded as legitimate service accounts.

description: Dragonfly has performed forced authentication to gather hashed user credentials over SMB using spearphishing attachments with external resource links and by modifying .LNK file icon resources to collect credentials from virtualized systems.

description: Dragonfly has performed screen captures of victims.
